analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nacetasiko dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na cetasikaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na cetasikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham cetasikam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nacetasiko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nacetasiko ca
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na cetasikaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na cetasikaḥ ca

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha
